enb_long_title: Eleventh session of the Conference of the Parties to the Climate Change Convention and first meeting of the Parties to the Kyoto Protocol
sentences: SBSTA Chair Abdullatif Benrageb (Libya) opened the session and introduced the provisional agenda.
The US, opposed by AOSIS, the EU and G-77/CHINA, requested removing agenda item 11(a) relating to small island developing States (SIDS).
The US also asked for clarification on inclusion of item 10 (IPCC special report on Carbon Dioxide Capture and Storage).
The agenda was provisionally adopted pending informal consultations on these issues.
Since Libya is not yet a Party to the Kyoto Protocol, SBSTA Vice-Chair Amjad Abdulla (Maldives) was invited to chair SBSTA for Protocol- related agenda items.
